localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Tomato 2 is a Pomodoro timer. It's simple, pretty and still pretty powerful– it has goal tracking, various modes of operation, website/app blocking and fun stats.
blogPost.body: Tomato 2 is a Pomodoro timer. It's simple, pretty and still pretty powerful– it has goal tracking, various modes of operation, website/app blocking and fun stats.
blogPost.title: Tomato 2 - Delightful pomodoro app
blogPost.author: Vojtech Rinik

localize.description: 西红柿2是一个波莫多罗计时器。它很简单，很漂亮，而且仍然相当强大-它有目标跟踪，各种操作模式，网站/应用程序拦截和有趣的统计数据。
西紅柿2是一個波莫多羅計時器。它很簡單，很漂亮，而且仍然相當強大-它有目標跟蹤，各種操作模式，網站/應用程序攔截和有趣的統計數據。

previous.excerpt: Links are the glue of the internet, yet by themselves they're just a string of undecipherable characters. With Peekalink, turn them into rich content your users will be delighted to share and engage in.
previous.title: Peekalink - An API to magically preview any link ✨

localize.description: 链接是互联网的粘合剂，但它们本身只是一串难以辨认的字符。有了Peekalink，将它们转化为丰富的内容，您的用户将乐于分享和参与。
localize.tagline: 一个可以神奇地预览任何链接的API✨。

localize.description: 鏈接是互聯網的粘合劑，但它們本身只是一串難以辨認的字符。有了Peekalink，將它們轉化爲豐富的內容，您的用戶將樂於分享和參與。
localize.tagline: 一個可以神奇地預覽任何鏈接的API✨。

next.excerpt: Everyone has a secret they want to hide."Banana" will be your reliable friend. With Banana, you can manage all your secrets such as videos, photos, web links. that you don't want anyone to see. Banana provide you a delicious experience with a clean design.
next.title: Banana - Keep your secrets hidden and safe.

localize.description: 每个人都有自己想要隐藏的秘密，"Banana "将是你可靠的朋友。有了Banana，你可以管理你所有的秘密，如视频，照片，网页链接等，你不想让任何人看到。香蕉 "以简洁的设计为您提供美味的体验。
localize.tagline: 把你的秘密隐藏起来，保证安全。

localize.description: 每個人都有自己想要隱藏的祕密，"Banana "將是你可靠的朋友。有了Banana，你可以管理你所有的祕密，如視頻，照片，網頁鏈接等，你不想讓任何人看到。香蕉 "以簡潔的設計爲您提供美味的體驗。
localize.tagline: 把你的祕密隱藏起來，保證安全。
